signInPrompt: [[en->ja --pre]] Enter details to sign in or add an account.
signUpPrompt: [[en->ja --pre]] Join the community to start sharing.
chooseAccountPrompt: [[en->ja --pre]] Select an account to continue or log in with a new one.
welcomeDescription: [[en->ja --pre]] Connect with friends, share your moments, and discover a universe of amazing content.
settingsDescription: [[en->ja --pre]] Manage your account preferences and privacy settings
profileInfoDescription: [[en->ja --pre]] Update your profile details and photo
themeDescription: [[en->ja --pre]] Select the theme for the application.
languageDescription: [[en->ja --pre]] Select the language for the application.
